article.name: How do I get an invoice when paying by credit card?
article.title: How do I get an invoice when paying by credit card?
article.body:
• We do not issue invoices if you pay by credit card.
  • You can download the monthly receipt from the link in the payment confirmation email or users with owner authority can download it here as well (supported after July 1, 2020).
    • You can also optionally register an additional email address to receive payment confirmation emails in the organization's email settings.
    • Please note that this receipt can be viewed by anyone who knows the URL.
